author: Staff Reporter
text:
An inquiry is being held into a child marriage between a 13-year-old girl and a 15-year- boy here at Dottamanji on Thally block on Thursday.

Based on a complaint by the girl’s mother to the district Childline, officials arrived at Dottamanji to inquire about the child marriage. According to sources, the girl was married off to the boy, who was a relative, by a few relatives without the knowledge of the mother herself.
title: Inquiry into child marriage
